install.name: Content - Cloud Zoom
install.author: Salvatore Guarino
install.description: With this plugin you can embed zoomable image in you article, simple using {cloudzoom | img='path/to/bigimage.jpg' | title='image title' | rel='rel parameter'}. The filename of the related small image for the magnify effect has to be named with the suffix _small (image_small.jpg) and has to be in the same folder as the big image (image.jpg)

param.name: incjquery
param.label: Include jQuery
param.description: Use this plugin to include the jQuery javascript file. Do not set this to 'DO NOT INCLUDE' unless you are including jQuery elsewhere - for instance in another extension or in your template.
param.option: Do not include jQuery javascript file

param.name: jquerynoconflict
param.label: jQuery noConflict mode
param.description: Allows to activate jQuery().noConflict() mode. Make sure you scripts are adapted. Use carefully, sometimes this mode disables dropdown menu in adminpanel (only in case when the option below is activated). Improved in v1.2.
